id,

enable,

mapper.update:
update destination
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name_en = #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country_value = #{countryValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gallery_id = #{galleryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gallery_name = #{galleryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image_path = #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update destination set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_en = #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country_value = #{countryValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gallery_id = #{galleryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gallery_name = #{galleryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_path = #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from destination where 1=1
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{keyword} , '%')
order by id DESC
select name,id as value,'0' as type,image_path as attr from destination where 1=1 order by id DESC
